titles.title: Specialty Crop Insurance Act of 2011
A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to support crop insurance for specialty crops, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: 11/18/2011--Introduced. Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to revise crop insurance provisions regarding approval of advance payments for a portion of specialty crop research and development costs.
